definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
well sweep (device for raising and lowering a bucket in a well, using a pivoted pole)

sentences.english: Citrinin is a mycotoxin which can induce renal dysfunction, and it is tumorigenic.
sentences.chinese: 桔青黴素是能引起腎臟毒性的真菌毒素，並有致癌性。

sentences.english: Even the car park will be situated in an orange grove.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連停車場都位於一片桔林裏。

sentences.english: The losses of pigment and citrinin were augmented with the increase of the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 隨着溫度升高，色素和桔黴素損失增大。

sentences.english: So the people scattered all over Egypt to gather stubble to use for straw.
sentences.chinese: 於是百姓散在埃及遍地，撿碎桔當做草。

sentences.english: Or take a bilberry supplement every morning.
Spread bilberry jam on your morning toast.
sentences.chinese: 在你的烤麪包內摸上越桔的果醬。

sentences.english: The inhibitory effect of copper-loaded montmorillonite on Aspergillus niger and Penicillium citrinum had been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了載銅蒙脫土對黑麴黴和桔青黴的抑制效果。

sentences.english: A well-sweep is an old instrument used for carrying water commonly used in villages.
sentences.chinese: 在農村桔槔是常用的舊式提水器具。

sentences.english: HPLC method of analysis of Monascus citrinin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了紅曲黴真菌毒素桔黴素的HPLC檢測方法。

sentences.english: Curcuma Longa probably include the excitant or antagonist of gastrin receptor.
sentences.chinese: 薑黃含泌素受體激動劑桔抗劑。

definition: pomelo (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
